description: Fired when the anatomy visualizer state changes, including transitions between loading, loaded, rendering, and ready states.

payloadSchema.description: Defines the structure for the 'anatomy:visualizer_state_changed' event payload.

previousState.description: The state the visualizer was in before this change.

currentState.description: The current state of the visualizer after this change.

selectedEntity.description: The ID of the currently selected entity, or null if no entity is selected.

anatomyData.description: The anatomy data for the selected entity, or null if no data is available.

error.description: Error information if the visualizer is in an error state, or null if no error occurred.
